title: VOLCANO
text: Now you be careful, Eric. The woods can be very dangerous.

title: VOLCANO
text: Okay, mom.

title: VOLCANO
role: A large truck pulls up, driven by Uncle Jimbo in hunting
text: clothes. Ned is in the passenger seat, and Stan, Kyle and Kenny are in the back seat.

title: VOLCANO
text: Ready to go hunting, Cartman?

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, my uncle Jimbo says we got to get up there early! Right, Uncle Jimbo?

title: VOLCANO
text: That's right, Stanley, animals are much easier to shoot in the morning!

title: VOLCANO
text: Here, hon, I packed you some cheesy poofs and Happy Tarts.

title: VOLCANO
role: She hands him a brown bag. Cartman gets in the back seat
text: with the other boys.

title: VOLCANO
text: Don't worry, Ms. Cartman, we'll take good care of him. I brought my old war buddy Ned to keep things safe.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hello Mrs. Cartman, how are you today?

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned waves from the passenger seat. He only has one arm. Jimbo
text: and Ned exchange knowing glances. Cartman gets in the back seat with the other boys.

title: VOLCANO
text: Be sure to use lots of bug spray. And if you have to poo-poo, don't wipe with poison ivy.

title: VOLCANO
role: The boys all laugh at Cartman.

title: VOLCANO
text: Dude, that's SICK, mom!

title: VOLCANO
text: And I know it can get scary up in those woods... But just remember mommy's not far away.

title: VOLCANO
text: (To Uncle Jimbo) Drive! Drive!

title: VOLCANO
text: You give your mommy a kissy.

title: VOLCANO
text: Drive the car damnit drive.

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman looks back to watch his mom waving goodbye.

title: VOLCANO
text: (Ms. Cartman's voice) Don't get scared up in the mountains, Cartman.

title: VOLCANO
text: Shut up! I'm not scared of nothing!

title: VOLCANO
text: Maybe your mom can give me a kiss too Cartman.

title: VOLCANO
text: Mph rmph rm rmph mphr!

title: VOLCANO
text: Ho Ho, that's disgusting!

title: VOLCANO
text: You piece of crap! I'll kill you!

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman slugs Kenny. The two boys fight in the back seat.

title: VOLCANO
text: That's the spirit, boys! Let's get that testosterone flowing!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman and Kenny pound the shit out of each other.

title: VOLCANO
text: Now boys, boys, I need to get serious for a minute. I want you to understand a few basic rules of hunting since this is your first time.

title: VOLCANO
text: First of all, don't ever walk with your gun unless the safety's on. Second, don't shoot anything that looks human, and third never spill your beer in the bullet chamber.

title: VOLCANO
text: Uh, Uncle Jimbo, we don't drink beer.

title: VOLCANO
text: You what?

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh yeah, that's right, I don't think 8 year old kids drink beer.

title: VOLCANO
text: I like chocolate milk!

title: VOLCANO
text: Well, we'll be doing plenty of drinking on this trip. After all, hunting sober is like fishing sober. It sure will be nice to get out of the city for a while. Away from civilization.

title: VOLCANO
role: The car drives out of the town, and up a little road that
text: goes up a mountain. The trip is ridiculously short.

title: VOLCANO
role: EXT. ROCKY MOUNTAINS, JUST OUTSIDE OF SOUTH PARK - DAY

title: VOLCANO
text: Well, here we are!

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned's truck comes to a stop in a large clearing amidst a big
text: forest of pine trees.

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned and Jimbo and the four kids pile out of the car.

title: VOLCANO
text: Okay, each of you young'ins take a gun, a beer and some smokes.

title: VOLCANO
role: The kids divide up the supplies.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey, I didn't get a gun!

title: VOLCANO
text: Sweet. This is like the gun I used in Nam.

title: VOLCANO
text: You weren't in Vietnam, Cartman!

title: VOLCANO
text: Were you stationed in DaNang?

title: VOLCANO
text: Cartman always makes stuff up, Ned. You can't believe anything he says.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey! I'll blow your friggin' head off!

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman points his gun at Stan.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey, look out son, that's dangerous! You're gonna spill your beer!

title: VOLCANO
role: EXT. ROCKY MOUNTAINS, JUST OUTSIDE OF SOUTH PARK - DAY

title: VOLCANO
role: The boys follow Jimbo and Ned, each holding rifles that are
text: WAY to big for them, a can of beer and a cigarette.

title: VOLCANO
text: My Uncle Jimbo says that after this, he's gonna take me hunting in Africa!

title: VOLCANO
text: Wow, that'd be cool!

title: VOLCANO
text: My mom says there's a lot of black people in Africa.

title: VOLCANO
text: Boys! Lookie there!

title: VOLCANO
role: A cute, fuzzy little black bear sits in a nearby clearing,
text: licking its paws.

title: VOLCANO
text: That there's a Rocky Mountain Black Bear. One of the few remaining of its kind. Isn't it beautiful?

title: VOLCANO
role: The bear just sits there and blinks.

title: VOLCANO
text: My God it's coming right for us!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo whips out his huge rifle and shoots the bear dead.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey! It wasn't coming right for us! It was just sitting there!

title: VOLCANO
text: SHHH! Not so loud!! Now that there's just a technicality.

title: VOLCANO
text: What d'ya mean?

title: VOLCANO
text: You see boys, the Democrats have passed a lot of laws trying to stop us from hunting.

title: VOLCANO
text: Democrats piss me off!

title: VOLCANO
text: They say we can't shoot certain animals anymore unless they're posing an immediate threat. Therefore, before we shoot something, we have to say; "It's coming right for us!"

title: VOLCANO
text: Wow, you're smart, Uncle Jimbo!

title: VOLCANO
text: (pointing) Jimbo LOOK!

title: VOLCANO
role: A beautiful little doe comes over the hill.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh, it's a deer. Looks like about a 46 gauge, Ned.

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned pulls out a HUGE bazooka and hands it to Jimbo like a
text: golf caddy. Jimbo props the bazooka on his shoulder. The boys and Ned jump on the ground commando style.

title: VOLCANO
text: IT'S COMIN' RIGHT FOR US!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: The beautiful little doe looks on peacefully right where she
text: is.

title: VOLCANO
role: BOOM!!! Jimbo fires the bazooka at the doe and totally
text: obliterates it into a million bloody little pieces.

title: VOLCANO
text: Kick ass!

title: VOLCANO
text: Did ya see that? I was imperiled by that ferocious charging buck!

title: VOLCANO
text: Rabbit, rabbit five o'clock!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Over the ridge is a little bunny rabbit.

title: VOLCANO
text: Let's move! MOVE!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo hits the ground and starts crawling on his belly. All
text: the boys follow suit.

title: VOLCANO
text: Is this hunting?

title: VOLCANO
text: I guess so.

title: VOLCANO
role: The group crawls onward, holding their guns out in front of
text: them.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh, dude... I'm starting to have flashbacks!

title: VOLCANO
text: What?

title: VOLCANO
text: Danforth! Pull up flank, look out for Charlies up in the trees!

title: VOLCANO
role: The group scampers up to the top of ridge. Ned hands Stan a
text: big-ass double-barrel shotgun.

title: VOLCANO
text: This one's yours, Stan!

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan uncomfortably takes the gun, hitches it up on his
text: shoulders and looks over the barrel. The little cute bunny looks up, sees Stan and smiles. Stan gulps.

title: VOLCANO
text: 'It's comin' right for us'!

title: VOLCANO
text: "It's coming right for us"!

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan takes a deep breath and is about to pull the trigger
text: when the bunny gives him just the cutest little twitch of his cute little nose.

title: VOLCANO
text: Shoot it, Stan!

title: VOLCANO
text: I got your back, soldier!

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan looks over the barrel again, takes another deep breath...

title: VOLCANO
text: I can't...

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan lowers the gun. The little rabbit dashes off into the
text: woods.

title: VOLCANO
text: What the-- What's wrong with you?!

title: VOLCANO
text: I don't wanna shoot the bunny.

title: VOLCANO
text: (shocked) What the hell are you talking about, you don't want to shoot the bunny? You're babbling, you're not making any sense! You're hysterical!

title: VOLCANO
text: I'm not hysterical. I just don't want to shoot the bunny.

title: VOLCANO
text: No nephew of mine is gonna be a tree hugger!

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, hippie! Go back to Woodstock if you can't shoot anything!

title: VOLCANO
text: I can shoot you fat ass!

title: VOLCANO
text: I can shoot you too.

title: VOLCANO
text: I'll kill you!

title: VOLCANO
text: I'll fill you full of lead.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey, what's that????

title: VOLCANO
role: Establishing shot of the town. Right next to Tom's Rhinoplasty
text: is a small brick building with antenna on its roof and a sign the reads "South Park Center for Seismic Activity."

title: VOLCANO
role: A very average looking GEOLOGIST is sitting at the seismograph
text: and just staring at it.

title: VOLCANO
role: For a long time he just sits there and stares at the little
text: needle drawing a straight line.

title: VOLCANO
role: Suddenly, the needle starts to move! The Geologist perks up
text: and moves in closer.

title: VOLCANO
text: What the heck is this?

title: VOLCANO
role: The needle moves frantically. The Geologist grabs the
text: telephone and dials a number.

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, Frank? It's uh, Randy. Uh-huh... Good. Yeah, listen, the, uh, the little needle's moving.

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, it's going back and forth really fast. What does that mean?

title: VOLCANO
text: Uh-huh... Uh-huh..., let me check...

title: VOLCANO
role: The Geologist wheels back in his chair and looks at the peak
text: of Mt. Evanston which is smoking.

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, it's smoking... Uh-huh... Oh really? Really?

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh my God...... A volcano!

title: VOLCANO
role: He drinks some coffee and sighs.

title: VOLCANO
role: The boys and Jimbo and Ned sit around a sputtering little
text: fire trying to cook wienies.

title: VOLCANO
text: My wienies won't cook!

title: VOLCANO
text: This wood won't burn.

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo takes a huge swig of Gin.

title: VOLCANO
text: Well Ned, looks like we'll have to use the ol' Indian fire trick.

title: VOLCANO
text: Yepper!

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned jumps up and grabs a huge can of gasoline.

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned douses the fire with gas. The flames explode about 50
text: feet high! The fire travels into the can of gas and Ned suddenly catches on fire.

title: VOLCANO
text: AAAGGGHHH!!!

title: VOLCANO
text: (Laughing) HA, HA! HEY, STOP, DROP AND ROLL, NED!! HA, HA!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned drops the gas can as he drops to the ground. Both the
text: gas and fire flow underneath Jimbo's van, igniting it into a blazing inferno.

title: VOLCANO
role: KABLAM! Jimbo's van explodes in a huge fireball.

title: VOLCANO
text: Woa!

title: VOLCANO
text: Godammit Ned, I just got that van! How the hell are we supposed to get home?

title: VOLCANO
role: But Ned is busy rolling around on the ground, trying to stop
text: himself from burning.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh it hurts! It hurts!

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman puts his wienie on a stick over Ned's burning body.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey you guys! This works pretty good right now!

title: VOLCANO
role: The sun rises in South Park. Another day has begun.

title: VOLCANO
role: Chef is sitting in the Mayor's office having a meeting.

title: VOLCANO
text: But you see, Mr. Mayor, you can't stop serving Salisbury Steak in our public schools... What's next? Meat Loaf?

title: VOLCANO
text: We are quite aware of your concerns, Chef, but-

title: VOLCANO
role: A buzzer on the Mayor's desk sounds.

title: VOLCANO
text: Mayor, the Geologist is here to see you.

title: VOLCANO
text: My Geologist? Now? Tell him the infection is fine and I don't need another check up.

title: VOLCANO
text: No, Mayor, that's a GYNECOLOGIST. A GEOLOGIST studies the Earth.

title: VOLCANO
role: The Mayor thinks long and hard.

title: VOLCANO
text: Don't you think I know that?! How dare you insult my intellect! I went to Princeton for God's sake! You get out of my office!!

title: VOLCANO
text: I'm not in your office Mayor, I'm talking to you through a speaker.

title: VOLCANO
text: Just send in the Geomotrist!

title: VOLCANO
text: Geologist.

title: VOLCANO
text: YOU ARE FIRED BUDDY!

title: VOLCANO
text: Thank you, Mayor. It's been great working for you.

title: VOLCANO
role: Suddenly, the Geologist bursts into the room.

title: VOLCANO
text: Mayor! We have got A VERY BIG PROBLEM! Mount Evanston is about to erupt!

title: VOLCANO
text: What does this mean to the town?

title: VOLCANO
role: The Geologist takes out another chart. It is very simple.

title: VOLCANO
text: Well this graph shows everything from normal to bad. Right now, South Park is here:

title: VOLCANO
role: He points with the pointer to 'Totally Screwed'. The Mayor
text: stands up.

title: VOLCANO
text: My God...

title: VOLCANO
text: Mayor! Some of the school children are up camping on that mountain RIGHT NOW!

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh, oh, this IS Big! (Through intercom) Johnson! Johnson are you there?!

title: VOLCANO
text: Uh, you just fired Johnson, Mayor. I'm his replacement, Ted.

title: VOLCANO
text: Ted, we have got a MAJOR crisis here! I want you to get on the phone, and call Inside Edition, Rescue 911, oh and Entertainment tonight. And you better get my stylist on the phone, too. Don't worry, things are under control.

title: VOLCANO
role: Chef and the Geologist blink at each other.

title: VOLCANO
role: Establishing shot of the moon over the starry, South Park
text: sky.

title: VOLCANO
role: The boys listen intently to Jimbo as he finishes his ghost
text: story.

title: VOLCANO
text: And then Ned picked up the grenade and BLOOM!! Blasted his arm clear off!

title: VOLCANO
role: The boys all shudder with fear. Ned smiles.

title: VOLCANO
text: We spent three hours looking for that damn arm. But it was never to be found! Some say it's still crawling around to this day!

title: VOLCANO
role: Suddenly, Ned grabs Cartman with his prosthetic arm. Cartman
text: screams in horror.

title: VOLCANO
text: RAAAAAR!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo, Ned and the boys all laugh.

title: VOLCANO
text: Ha, ha! Got'chya!

title: VOLCANO
text: (Obviously scared) Huh-huh... That's not scary...

title: VOLCANO
text: You were scared, Cartman! You almost peed your pants!

title: VOLCANO
text: SHUT UP! I DIDN'T PEE MY PANTS!!!!

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey Ned, hand me that gin.

title: VOLCANO
text: You boys want to tie one on?

title: VOLCANO
text: No, no thanks, that stuff tastes like pee.

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, Cartman's pee.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh, you would taste my pee.

title: VOLCANO
role: The boys all shake their heads.

title: VOLCANO
text: What the hell's wrong with you? Can't you handle a little alcohol?

title: VOLCANO
role: Kenny grabs another can of gas and starts chugging it.

title: VOLCANO
text: Christ! Look at the little bastard go!

title: VOLCANO
text: Now you see that Stan? Now now that is a dirty little bastard.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey, I'm a dirty little bastard too.

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan slouches his shoulders and sulks.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey you guys... I know a scary story.

title: VOLCANO
text: Shut up, Cartman, you can't scare anybody.

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman takes the flashlight and shines it under his face.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh yeah? Have you guys ever heard of... Scuzzlebutt?

title: VOLCANO
text: Whattlebutt?

title: VOLCANO
text: Scuzzlebutt is a creature that lives up on this very mountain and kills anybody who dares climb to the top.

title: VOLCANO
text: Why?

title: VOLCANO
text: Because it loves the taste of blood! And likes to add pieces to its deformed body!

title: VOLCANO
role: The boys gather in around Cartman, entranced.

title: VOLCANO
text: Deformed how?

title: VOLCANO
text: Well, on his left arm, instead of a hand he has...

title: VOLCANO
text: A hook!

title: VOLCANO
text: A knife!

title: VOLCANO
text: No! (Pause) ...A piece of celery.

title: VOLCANO
text: Celery?!

title: VOLCANO
text: Yes, and he walks with a limp, because one of his legs is missing... And where his leg should be, there's nothing but... PATRICK DUFFY!

title: VOLCANO
text: Patrick Duffy?! Dammit, Cartman, that's not scary!

title: VOLCANO
text: What do you mean? Have you ever seen 'Step by Step'?!

title: VOLCANO
text: So he lives alone on this mountain, and weaves baskets and other assorted crafts. They say that on quiet nights, you can hear him weaving his baskets... Ka shink... Ka-shink... Ka-shink.

title: VOLCANO
text: Cartman, you suck at telling scary stories!

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, gimme that flashlight!

title: VOLCANO
text: Mph rmph rmm rmph!

title: VOLCANO
role: Suddenly, the ground starts to rumble again. The boys all
text: look around, scared.

title: VOLCANO
text: What is that?

title: VOLCANO
text: (Laughing) Maybe it's Scuzzlebutt coming to weave us into wicker baskets!

title: VOLCANO
text: (Suddenly scared) HEY! It might be!!

title: VOLCANO
text: Gosh, I hope he doesn't cut me with his celery hand.

title: VOLCANO
text: Screw you guys!

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey Ned, Why don't you whip out the old cancer Kazoo, let's do a little song.

title: VOLCANO
text: Koom by ya my Lord, Koom by ya. Koom by ya my Lord, Koom by ya. Koom by ya my Lord, Koom by ya. Oh Lord Koom by ya. Someone's crying my Lord Koom by ya.

title: VOLCANO
text: They don't think Scuzzlebutt is scary huh, Let's see how they like it when they actually see Scuzzlebutt. I'll scare the hell out of 'em tomorrow.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh Lord Koom by ya. Someone's crying my Lord Koom by ya......

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan is snoozing away in his sleeping bag.

title: VOLCANO
text: Stan! Stan wake up!

title: VOLCANO
text: (Groggily) What, dude?

title: VOLCANO
text: I don't know where Cartman is. I think something took him away!

title: VOLCANO
text: Well, where's my Uncle Jimbo and Ned?

title: VOLCANO
text: They're out fishing with Kenny.

title: VOLCANO
text: (Hurt) With Kenny? But, but this was supposed to MY camping trip... Why do they like Kenny so much? Doesn't he like me anymore?

title: VOLCANO
text: Well Stan, you want to know what I think?

title: VOLCANO
text: What?

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo, Ned and Kenny are on a little canoe on the lake.

title: VOLCANO
role: Oddly, they have no fishing poles.

title: VOLCANO
text: What a beautiful morning for fishing. There's one!! There's a fish right there!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo pulls the pin out of a grenade and throws it in the
text: water. BLOOOOMM!!!!! Water explodes, and the dead fish goes flying into the air.

title: VOLCANO
text: Got it!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Kenny grabs a grenade and tosses it toward the shore.

title: VOLCANO
role: BOOOM!!! A few fish go flying.

title: VOLCANO
text: Great instincts, boy!

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan runs up to the shore and calls out to the canoe.

title: VOLCANO
text: Uncle Jimbo! Cartman's missing!

title: VOLCANO
text: Who, the fat kid?

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh hell, I guess we better go look for him. Ned, we gotta cut it short. Fire up the 12-20.

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned presses a button on the huge rocket mounted on the side
text: of the boat.

title: VOLCANO
role: The rocket fires deep into the water, a large surge follows,
text: and then hundreds of dead fish float to the surface.

title: VOLCANO
text: Well, I think that's about the limit for our fishing permit.

title: VOLCANO
text: Man, it smells like dead fish here.

title: VOLCANO
text: Mph rmph rm rmph!

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh, man! That is NASTY!!

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah! I don't think I've ever seen a kid as cool as you, Kenny. I'm making you my honorary Nephew!

title: VOLCANO
text: Mrph.

title: VOLCANO
role: The whole city has turned out to see the spectacle of news
text: crews that has overtaken South Park.

title: VOLCANO
text: The people of South Park are humble and friendly. But now, a ticking time bomb of hot lava waits to engulf these people and end their miserable lives with one last fleeting moment of excruciatingly painful, burning agony.

title: VOLCANO
role: The camera pans onto the townspeople who all cheer and wave
text: at the camera happily. All trying to be seen on television.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey, I'm on TV, I'm on TV!!!

title: VOLCANO
text: Mayor, what are you doing to prepare for this inevitable catastrophe?

title: VOLCANO
text: All we know right now is that some of our children are camping on that mountain, and. I'm sorry can I start over?

title: VOLCANO
text: Huh?

title: VOLCANO
text: Well you can edit this, right? Ready? 3,2,1 - "All we know right now is that some of our children are up camping on that mountain. We can't do anything until we get them."

title: VOLCANO
role: The Mayor stands proudly in front of the townspeople.

title: VOLCANO
text: Okay people! Let's go get those kids!

title: VOLCANO
role: The rescue crew, compiled of Chef, Barbrady, Garrison and
text: several other townspeople, look extremely concerned for their lives.

title: VOLCANO
text: C'mon everybody, You got to help the children!

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned, Jimbo, Stan, Kyle and Kenny traipsing through the
text: mountains.

title: VOLCANO
text: Well, he couldn't have gone far... Unless something drug him off...

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan and Kyle look at each other.

title: VOLCANO
text: There's not many animals out today Jimbo.

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, it's almost like something funny's going on...

title: VOLCANO
role: The ground rumbles a little bit.

title: VOLCANO
text: Christ Ned, what'd you have for breakfast?

title: VOLCANO
text: I don't know man, I've got some bad gas.

title: VOLCANO
text: Wait, There's a ram! It's coming right for us!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo uses an M-16 automatic and blows holes through the ram
text: like swiss cheese. Kenny stands next to Jimbo and fires some last remaining shots.

title: VOLCANO
text: Nice shooting, Kenny! Here, you need a bigger gun!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo grabs the large rifle out of Stan's hands, then grabs
text: the smaller rifle out of Kenny's hands and then switches them. Stan fumes.

title: VOLCANO
text: Look!

title: VOLCANO
role: On top of the ridge, they see a strange creature moving. It
text: has a pot for a head and two huge branches for arms.

title: VOLCANO
text: I am Scuzzlebutt! Lord of the Mountains! Behold my Patrick Duffy leg.

title: VOLCANO
text: What is it?

title: VOLCANO
text: Dude, it's Scuzzlebutt! Cartman wasn't lying!

title: VOLCANO
text: Holy crow! We could make a MINT killing this thing!!

title: VOLCANO
text: We'll be on the cover of Guns and Ammo!

title: VOLCANO
text: This calls for some HJ-14!

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman jumps up and down and makes wild noises.

title: VOLCANO
text: Huh-huh... Those guys are totally scared.

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo has two huge rockets strapped onto his shoulders. He
text: grabs hold of a chord--

title: VOLCANO
text: Fire in the hole!

title: VOLCANO
role: ZBAM!! Jimbo pulls the chord and the rockets fire towards
text: Cartman.

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman quickly stops laughing and drops his smile.

title: VOLCANO
text: Holy crap!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman jumps to the side. The rockets just miss him and
text: explode into the rocks with an enormous boom.

title: VOLCANO
text: Dammit, I think I missed!

title: VOLCANO
text: What the hell is wrong with you people?!

title: VOLCANO
text: Come on, let's move! MOVE!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Cartman tries to pull his costume off, but it's stuck.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey wait. Arhhhhhhh!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: The group dashes up the ridge. Cartman yelps and runs away.

title: VOLCANO
role: The townspeople have set up a large camp at the base of Mt.
text: Evanston. Everyone is gathered around the Mayor, ad libbing shouts and concerns.

title: VOLCANO
text: (Seeing she's on camera) Is it on? OK, Okay, people! Form groups and search the mountain! Report back here every hour! You got that?

title: VOLCANO
text: Mayor! I might have an idea!

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh, what?

title: VOLCANO
role: The geologist takes out a huge map.

title: VOLCANO
text: If we can dig a very large trench, we can divert the lava into a Canyon! And then it would bypass South Park pretty much completely!

title: VOLCANO
text: And... that would be good, right?

title: VOLCANO
text: I'm pretty sure!

title: VOLCANO
text: Well what are we waiting for! Okay, people, change of plans! Half of you grab shovels!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo and the kids traipse through the woods.

title: VOLCANO
text: These look like his tracks! He must have gone this way! Ned!

title: VOLCANO
text: Prepare some HK-12 and some plasticine.

title: VOLCANO
text: I'll bet that sucker's headed for a higher elevation. The higher up it-- BIRD!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo shoots a bird out of the sky.

title: VOLCANO
text: The higher up it goes, the better it can breathe.

title: VOLCANO
text: Look up there!

title: VOLCANO
role: Everybody looks up to where a little figure is standing near
text: a cave. In the EXTREMELY FAR DISTANCE we can hear a voice.

title: VOLCANO
text: (Very faint) You guys, it's just me.

title: VOLCANO
text: Are we sure it's Scuzzlebutt?

title: VOLCANO
text: Does it have Patrick Duffy for a leg?

title: VOLCANO
text: Well I can't tell. Let's kill it.

title: VOLCANO
text: I've got to get out of this stupid costume.

title: VOLCANO
text: Kenny, you take the front.

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan comes to the front with a huge shotgun.

title: VOLCANO
text: No, I can do it, Uncle Jimbo. I wanna bag that animal!

title: VOLCANO
text: That's the spirit, kiddo! Let's hunt!

title: VOLCANO
text: You guys, you guys I was just kidding.

title: VOLCANO
role: The trench is already huge and deep. Everyone works on it
text: feverishly when suddenly Officer Barbrady calls everybody together.

title: VOLCANO
text: As some people of South Park try desperately to save their mountain town, others look for the missing townspeople, but all must take every precaution necessary.

title: VOLCANO
text: Okay people, listen up!

title: VOLCANO
role: Barbrady opens a large white projection screen.

title: VOLCANO
text: As we near the top of the mountain, the chances of our encountering some lava becomes great. Therefore, I have special ordered this training film to assist us in volcano safety. Mr. Garrison, if you would please.

title: VOLCANO
role: Garrison turns on a rickety old projector. A black and white,
text: scratched up 50's style film begins.

title: VOLCANO
role: Our 50's style narrator sits at an old oak desk with his
text: hands folded.

title: VOLCANO
text: Harbingers of sorrow, natural disasters can be the cause of troubling and undesirable stress; And a volcano is no exception. But what should you do if a volcano erupts near you or your family?

title: VOLCANO
role: A pleasant 50's style family is gathered on a blanket, having
text: a picnic.

title: VOLCANO
text: Here we see the Stevens family enjoying Sunday picnic. But suddenly, Daughter hears a noise.

title: VOLCANO
text: It's a volcano. Junior seems worried. But have no fear, junior, Jane learned in school what to do when you hear a volcano erupt.

title: VOLCANO
role: Jane takes the picnic blanket and covers the family with it.

title: VOLCANO
text: That's right, Jane. Duck and cover.

title: VOLCANO
role: Lava flows over the family. But as soon as the lava is gone,
text: the family emerges from underneath the blanket safe and sound.

title: VOLCANO
role: Two young boys ride bicycles down the road.

title: VOLCANO
text: So what will you do when you hear a volcano erupting?

title: VOLCANO
role: The ground shakes, the boys look around, then quickly jump
text: off their bikes and crouch next to a nearby tree.

title: VOLCANO
text: That's right. Duck and cover. Looks like you got the idea.

title: VOLCANO
role: More people ducking and covering as lava passes harmlessly
text: over them.

title: VOLCANO
text: Duck and cover. Thank you and goodbye.

title: VOLCANO
text: Okay, any questions?

title: VOLCANO
text: That has got to be the most ridiculous load of pigcrap I have ever seen.

title: VOLCANO
text: That's enough out of you!

title: VOLCANO
role: The group continues their hot pursuit.

title: VOLCANO
text: I'm gonna bag Scuzzlebutt, then we'll see who's a little bastard!

title: VOLCANO
role: Stan takes aim at Cartman through the gunsites.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey!! Seriously you guys...

title: VOLCANO
role: But the group can't hear him. Stan levels the gun.

title: VOLCANO
text: Kill it Stan. Kill it!

title: VOLCANO
role: As hard as he tries, Stan can't shoot. He still can't kill.

title: VOLCANO
role: He takes a deep breath and tries again. But he just can't.

title: VOLCANO
text: C'mon Stan kill it!

title: VOLCANO
text: AW, DAMMIT! I CAN'T DO IT!

title: VOLCANO
text: You pansy! Give me that gun!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo rips the gun out of Stan's hands. Just then, Cartman
text: manages to get off his disguise.

title: VOLCANO
text: HEY!!!!

title: VOLCANO
text: Cartman?

title: VOLCANO
text: God Dammit, don't shoot me!

title: VOLCANO
text: What the Sam Hell?

title: VOLCANO
text: I was just trying to scare you guys. You can put that gun down now.

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo and Ned sighs with disappointment.

title: VOLCANO
text: So much for the cover of Guns & Ammo.

title: VOLCANO
text: Yepper. But I think we've learned some important lessons Ned- I think that -

title: VOLCANO
role: KA-BAM!!!! The top of the mountain blows its top and lava
text: fires up into the air.

title: VOLCANO
text: WOA!!

title: VOLCANO
text: Holy crap!

title: VOLCANO
text: The Mountain, it's BLOWN IT'S TOP!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Suddenly, a huge lava bomb shoots up into the air from the
text: volcano.

title: VOLCANO
role: The lava bomb drops from the sky. SCRUNCH!! It lands directly
text: on top of Kenny.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh my God! they killed Kenny!

title: VOLCANO
role: Just then, Kenny appears from behind the lava bomb,
text: apparently, it landed in front of him.

title: VOLCANO
text: Mph rmph rm!

title: VOLCANO
role: Kenny waves happily. But just then, the large, round lava
text: bomb rolls over on top of Kenny, smothering and burning him instantly.

title: VOLCANO
role: The hot molten rock rushes down the mountain. A large group
text: of rescue workers spot the flow.

title: VOLCANO
text: Look!! The volcano!!!

title: VOLCANO
text: Quick! Duck and Cover!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: The group ducks down and huddles on the ground.

title: VOLCANO
role: WHOOOSH! The hot lava covers them, burning them instantly to
text: death.

title: VOLCANO
role: The lava continues to flow down the mountain.

title: VOLCANO
text: That lava's coming right for us!

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh, no! LOOK!

title: VOLCANO
role: Everybody turns to see Jimbo, Ned and the boys all running
text: for their lives down the mountain. But they are on the other side of the large trench.

title: VOLCANO
text: What the hell is this trench doing here? We can't get across!

title: VOLCANO
role: The T.V. Anchor is reporting the scene to the camera.

title: VOLCANO
text: It now looks as if the missing children are trapped in the path of hot, nasty lava!

title: VOLCANO
role: The camera turns to the Mayor.

title: VOLCANO
text: God, please deliver those darling kids from... Wait, wait wait wait. 3,2,and 1: God, please deliver...

title: VOLCANO
role: The townspeople can't do anything but watch in horror.

title: VOLCANO
role: The lava rushes towards the group.

title: VOLCANO
text: HELP!!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Just then, the group hears a strange noise.

title: VOLCANO
text: Grrrrrr.

title: VOLCANO
role: All of a sudden, a large bipedal creature appears! Covered
text: in purple fur, the creature is HUGE and hideous.

title: VOLCANO
text: Jiminy Poke! It's the REAL Scuzzlebutt!

title: VOLCANO
text: What?! Scuzzlebutt's real?!

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh my God!! Look at his leg!

title: VOLCANO
role: The boys look down to see that the creature, sure enough,
text: has Patrick Duffy instead of a leg.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hi, kids. I'm T.V.'s Patrick Duffy.

title: VOLCANO
text: Quick Ned! Shoot it!!!

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned fires his rifle. CLICK! It's empty.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh no! out of ammo!

title: VOLCANO
role: Scuzzlebutt approaches menacingly, making strange Scuzzlebutt
text: sounds.

title: VOLCANO
text: Grrrrrr.

title: VOLCANO
role: The group turns to run, but the wall of lava is but fifty
text: feet away and there is no way to go. They turn back around, but there is the looming Scuzzlebutt.

title: VOLCANO
text: What is that thing?

title: VOLCANO
text: That's Scuzzlebutt!

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, he has Patrick Duffy for a leg and weaves baskets.

title: VOLCANO
text: This isn't happening. Everyone look away, please. Nothing to see here.

title: VOLCANO
text: Well, boys... I'm sorry I got you all killed.

title: VOLCANO
role: Scuzzlebutt picks up a HUGE tree and starts to shred it with
text: his claws and teeth.

title: VOLCANO
text: AAAAGGHHH!!

title: VOLCANO
role: With lightning speed, Scuzzlebutt makes the tree into a large
text: wicker basket and gestures for the hunters to step in.

title: VOLCANO
text: Whoa, he built a wicker basket.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey! He's saving us!!

title: VOLCANO
text: Grrrrrr.

title: VOLCANO
role: Using a rope, Scuzzlebutt hoists the basket safely up over
text: the trench, and then sets it down among the other townspeople.

title: VOLCANO
text: Scuzzlebutt saved the day!

title: VOLCANO
text: And my calculations worked! The lava is following the trench into the Canyon!

title: VOLCANO
role: Sure enough the lava hits the trench and immediately diverts
text: away!

title: VOLCANO
text: Hmnn, Where exactly does the Canyon go?

title: VOLCANO
text: Uh...

title: VOLCANO
role: The hot lava travels down the canyon and smothers all of
text: Denver, destroying the entire city, burning buildings and killing millions.

title: VOLCANO
text: South Park is saved!

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey look, Kenny's OK.

title: VOLCANO
text: Mafmm Mmmfm Mma

title: VOLCANO
text: And now these humble people can rejoice and celebrate their jovial victory over nature. I'm getting word that the Chef of the school cafeteria wants to sing a song about this thrilling struggle of humanity.

title: VOLCANO
role: The press people and rest of South Park rejoice with Ned,
text: Jimbo and the boys. The whole town goes crazy with happiness.

title: VOLCANO
role: Music kicks in, Chef starts to sing.

title: VOLCANO
text: (Singing) Ooh, baby, every time that we kiss HOT LAVA! And every time we make love - That's lava, HOT LAVA! Lava so hot it makes me sweat, Lava so warm and red and wet - Lava !

title: VOLCANO
text: Mayor, what do you have to say about this wonderful outcome?

title: VOLCANO
text: Well, we owe everything to this friendly, yet misunderstood creature. Thank you, Scuzzlebutt.

title: VOLCANO
role: Scuzzlebutt leans down, plucks a flower and hands it to the
text: mayor.

title: VOLCANO
role: Scuzzlebutt starts to make a noise... A word is audible:

title: VOLCANO
text: ...Friend.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh, how sweet!

title: VOLCANO
role: Just then, Stan walks up to Scuzzlebutt, points the gun, and
text: blows its head off. His bulky body falls to the ground.

title: VOLCANO
text: I did it! I did it! I finally killed something!

title: VOLCANO
role: Jimbo and Ned look on in shock.

title: VOLCANO
text: Oh my God! What has he done?!

title: VOLCANO
text: Turn off the cameras.

title: VOLCANO
text: Hey! That was EASY!

title: VOLCANO
text: NOOOOO... Why God why?

title: VOLCANO
text: Damnit Stan, you shouldn't have done that!

title: VOLCANO
text: What? Why?

title: VOLCANO
text: Yea, make up your mind dude.

title: VOLCANO
text: Stan, some things you kill and some things you don't. See?

title: VOLCANO
text: No.

title: VOLCANO
text: Only now in this late hour do I see the folly of guns. I'll never use a gun again.

title: VOLCANO
role: Ned throws down the gun and it misfires killing Kenny.

title: VOLCANO
text: But I just wanted you to be proud of me like you were with Kenny.

title: VOLCANO
text: But Kenny's dead now Stan, and you're always going to be my nephew. And you just can't kill anything. You understand?

title: VOLCANO
text: Dude, I don't understand hunting at all.

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, it's stupid. Let's go watch cartoons.

title: VOLCANO
text: Yeah, cartoons kick ass.
